text: The Horse Soldiers is a 1959 American western adventure movie directed by John Ford and was based on the 1956 novel of the same name by Harold Sinclair. It stars John Wayne, William Holden, Constance Towers, Altea Gibson, Ken Curtis, Willis Bouchey, Bing Russell, Hank Worden, Anna Lee, Denver Pyle, Carleton Young and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1959 movies Category:1959 adventure movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Ford
title: The Horse Soldiers
